automount_service_account_token.Description: Auto-mount the given service account to tiller.

ca_certificate.Description: PEM-encoded root certificates bundle for TLS authentication.

client_certificate.Description: PEM-encoded client certificate for TLS authentication.

client_key.Description: PEM-encoded client certificate key for TLS authentication.

debug.Description: Debug indicates whether or not Helm is running in Debug mode.

enable_tls.Description: Enables TLS communications with the Tiller.

home.Description: Set an alternative location for Helm files. By default, these are stored in '~/.helm'.

host.Description: Set an alternative Tiller host. The format is host:port.

init_helm_home.Description: Initialize Helm home directory if it is not already initialized, defaults to true.

insecure.Description: Whether server should be accessed without verifying the TLS certificate.

install_tiller.Description: Install Tiller if it is not already installed.

client_certificate.Description: PEM-encoded client certificate for TLS authentication. Can be sourced from `KUBE_CLIENT_CERT_DATA`.

client_key.Description: PEM-encoded client certificate key for TLS authentication. Can be sourced from `KUBE_CLIENT_KEY_DATA`.

cluster_ca_certificate.Description: PEM-encoded root certificates bundle for TLS authentication. Can be sourced from `KUBE_CLUSTER_CA_CERT_DATA`.

config_context.Description: Context to choose from the config file. Can be sourced from `KUBE_CTX`.

config_path.Description: Path to the kube config file, defaults to ~/.kube/config. Can be sourced from `KUBE_CONFIG`.

host.Description: The hostname (in form of URI) of Kubernetes master. Can be sourced from `KUBE_HOST`.

insecure.Description: Whether server should be accessed without verifying the TLS certificate. Can be sourced from `KUBE_INSECURE`.

load_config_file.Description: By default the local config (~/.kube/config) is loaded when you use this provider. This option at false disable this behaviour.

password.Description: The password to use for HTTP basic authentication when accessing the Kubernetes master endpoint. Can be sourced from `KUBE_PASSWORD`.

token.Description: The bearer token to use for authentication when accessing the Kubernetes master endpoint. Can be sourced from `KUBE_BEARER_TOKEN`.

username.Description: The username to use for HTTP basic authentication when accessing the Kubernetes master endpoint. Can be sourced from `KUBE_USER`.

max_history.Description: Maximum number of release versions stored per release.

override.Description: Override values for the Tiller Deployment manifest.

plugins_disable.Description: Disable plugins. Set HELM_NO_PLUGINS=0 to enable plugins.

service_account.Description: Service account to install Tiller with.

devel.Description: Use chart development versions, too. Equivalent to version '>0.0.0-0'. If `version` is set, this is ignored

force_update.Description: Force resource update through delete/recreate if needed.

keyring.Description: Location of public keys used for verification. Used only if `verify` is true

name.Description: Name is the name of the release.

namespace.Description: Namespace is the kubernetes namespace of the release.

revision.Description: Version is an int32 which represents the version of the release.

values.Description: The raw yaml values used for the chart.

version.Description: A SemVer 2 conformant version string of the chart.

namespace.Description: Namespace to install the release into.

repository.Description: Repository where to locate the requested chart. If is an URL the chart is installed without installing the repository.

reuse.Description: Instruct Tiller to re-use an existing name.

reuse_values.Description: Reuse values when upgrading the release.

set.Description: Custom values to be merged with the values.

set_sensitive.Description: Custom sensitive values to be merged with the values.

set_string.Description: Custom string values to be merged with the values.

timeout.Description: Time in seconds to wait for any individual kubernetes operation.

values.Description: List of values in raw yaml format to pass to helm.

verify.Description: Verify the package before installing it.

version.Description: Specify the exact chart version to install. If this is not specified, the latest version is installed.

wait.Description: Will wait until all resources are in a ready state before marking the release as successful.

ca_file.Description: Verify certificates of HTTPS-enabled servers using this CA bundle

cert_file.Description: Identify HTTPS client using this SSL certificate file

key_file.Description: Identify HTTPS client using this SSL key file

name.Description: Name of the repository read from the home

url.Description: URL of the repository read from the home
